name: nasa-fullstack
description: Project containing front/back end nasa project

scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm start --prefix server
scripts.test: echnpm run test --prefex server && npm run test --prefix client
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build --prefix client && npm run cluster --prefix server
scripts.install: nom insstall --prefix client && npm install --prefix server

author: matytheu <me.adetunjim.com>
